SEARCH
Package com.example.teamalfred.database

Class SqliteAssessmentDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.teamalfred.database.SqliteAssessmentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssessmentDAO
public class SqliteAssessmentDAO extends Object implements AssessmentDAO
SQLite implementation of the AssessmentDAO interface. Provides CRUD operations for assessments stored in the database.

    • getAssessmentsByStudentId

      public List<Assessment> getAssessmentsByStudentId(int studentId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all assessments for a specific student by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A list of Assessment objects assigned to the student.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • insertAssessmentForSubject

      public void insertAssessmentForSubject(String title, String subject, String dueDate, String status, String type) throws SQLException
      Inserts the same assessment for all students enrolled in a specific subject.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the assessment.
      subject - The subject associated with the assessment.
      dueDate - The due date of the assessment.
      status - The current status (e.g., "Pending", "Completed").
      type - The type of assessment (e.g., "Quiz", "Assignment").
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
